entry.title: Thursday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain changing to flurries after midnight and ending before morning then cloudy. Snow inland. Fog patches dissipating after midnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 cm except 5 cm inland. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming north 20 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing in the afternoon. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 02 March 2023
